3.name: Minstrel
3.text:
"Oh, mighty hero Magmedor, the knight of strong
steel─── Why have you fallen to become a slayer───
No one can answer that question─── (Pololon)"

4.name: Minstrel
4.text:
"Enitouraya, with the beautiful eyes of a star───
That girl, noble and sharp, a silver moon shining
in the night sky─── Loved by the gods of travel
and wind─── (Pololon)"

5.name: Minstrel
5.text:
"Oh, mighty hero Drauken, the knight of pure
white─── Riding on the back of a powerful griffin,
he charges through numerous battlefields─── With
sharp claws and spear, chaos trembles in fear and
begs for mercy─── (Pololon)"

6.name: Minstrel
6.text:
"Yamano, the dragon slayer hero, bravely faces the
red dragon with just a sword─── His blade easily
cuts through scales and does not flinch at the
breath of flames─── And he even defeats the tyrant
of sky and fire─── (Pololon)"

11.name: Adventurer
11.text:
"Eni-sensei, she's amazing at swordsmanship...
She's been proposed to by many nobles, but turned
them all down. Then one day, she ended up in a
duel with a noble whose pride was hurt..."
11.text2:
「貴族の用意した凄腕の決闘代理人３人をたった一人で
　斬り伏せて、決闘場を悠々と出ていってさぁ……
　ヤバいよね」

12.name: Old Sage
12.text:
"It is instinctual for all dragons to hoard
treasures. Even among dragons, it seems that their
status is determined by the amount of treasures
they have hoarded. I somehow understand the reason
why they greedily amass wealth."
12.text2:
「ただ…彼らは自分たちで富を作ろうとは思わんらしい。
　他の種族が作り上げた物を集めたがる…というところか。
　なんとも難しい種族よのう」

13.name: Adventurer
13.text:
"The other day, I was attacked by a griffin. My
beloved horse was eaten..."
13.text2:
「あいつら、馬肉が好きすぎて、馬が目に入ったら
　脇目も振らずに襲ってくるし、邪魔したら激怒するしで
　ひでえんだよな……」

14.name: Female Magician
14.text:
"It seems that kobolds are originally a servant
race for dragons. Most of them seem to serve evil
dragons, but..."
14.text2:
「稀に善竜に仕えようとする子たちもいるらしいわ。
　そうなると、トンネルや治水を頑張ってくれるのね。
　私も欲しいわね、コボルトの従者」

15.name: Adventurer
15.text:
"Eni-sensei has been traveling alone throughout
the country for a long time and it seems she never
settles in one place. I wonder if it's a case of
wanderlust."
15.text2:
「…こう言っちゃなんだけど……
　多分結婚できそうにないよね、先生……」

16.name: Adventurer
16.text:
"I want the power of the dragon. I really want it.
I want it right now. I want it abundantly and
intensely."
16.text2:
「決して下心があるわけではない。
　でもイスクさんに口と胸で力を与えてもらいたい」

17.name: Adventurer
17.text:
"The Janios sect is notorious for being a wicked
cult. They are habitual kidnappers, and their
execution unit is called the 'Fangs of Janios'."
17.text2:
「人間やオーク、ゴブリンなどで構成されてるが
　たまに用心棒的にオーガなんかを連れてくるらしい。
　連中には要注意だぞ」

18.name: Adventurer
18.text:
"Do you know? It seems that the infamous Count
Lugome has been eliminated by someone. There are
rumors that it was the work of someone, or that he
was eliminated by neighboring countries, but the
truth is still unclear."
18.text2:
「あの凶悪なウォーロックであるルゴーム伯爵を
　誰かが倒したんだろうかね。恐ろしい話だね」

19.name: Female Monk
19.text:
"Lord Ishupel protects everyone from chaos and
illuminates the world. The majority of the people
living in this country believe in him..."
19.text2:
「年に３度行われる祭りも、今なお我らを守る
　イシュペール様に祈りと感謝を捧げるものなのです。
　貴方の庇護で我々は生を謳歌できるのです、と……」

20.name: Adventurer
20.text:
"Lord Ishupel protects the world, and his
daughter, Lady Auld, hunts down the wicked. That
is why we are able to live in this world..."
20.text2:
「故に、このお二人の神が最も信者が多いのです。
　ついで旅と風と交易の神フォーレ様……
　土と安息の死後と月を司るクローネ様などが
　おられます……」

21.name: Female Monk
21.text:
"Goddess of war, Lady Auld, not only watches over
the warriors fighting against external enemies,
but also protects the women who guard their homes
while the men are at war..."
21.text2:
「故に、戦を司る神でありながら、女性の信者も大変多いのです。
　冒険者の方においても、アウルド信徒のクレリックやシスターは
　よく見かけられるのですよ……」

22.name: Adventurer
22.text:
"Undead mages... in other words, magicians who
have become undead. They have defied the peace of
Lady Krone and granted themselves immortality with
wicked magic."
22.text2:
「肉体と生命を自分から捨てた奴らだ、相当に手強い。
　だがその不死も完全じゃあない。
　真に不死と言えるのはノーライフ・キングくらいだろう」

23.name: Female Magician
23.text:
"The underground world, Underworld, is a dangerous
place. Dark elves who have been deprived of their
dwellings from the surface world, evil spiders and
insects, a world of poison, mold, and darkness..."
23.text2:
「もし往くのであれば、心を強く持つのよ。
　彼の地は…私達地上の生物の心を蝕むのだから」

24.name: Patrol Knight
24.text:
"I've heard that recently, there's been a group
that seems to be a kidnappers' guild roaming
around. It's said that they attack villages and
travelers in groups, and then sell them in the
darkness."
24.text2:
「何たる不逞な輩よ。
　貴殿も可憐な少女の御姿故、狙われるやも知れぬ。
　努々注意なされよ、黄金竜よ」

25.name: Adventurer
25.text:
"You know about the orcs, right? They're that
repulsive and wicked race with pig-like faces.
They're a bit special, as they have both males and
females, and they excel at breeding with different
races."
25.text2:
「詳しくは知らないが、連中の信仰してる女神が
　”産めよ増やせよ地に満ちよ　胎にはこだわるな”みたいでさ……
　むしろ征服した異種族を使って自分の種族を増やすのは誉って
　いう価値観らしい。怖いねぇ」

26.name: Adventurer
26.text:
"When it comes to the specialty of this village,
it's definitely the 'Headless Beauty Inn's Very
Pie! It's an exquisite dish made with plenty of
berries preserved in sugar that can be abundantly
found nearby."
26.text2:
「意外とファンが多くてさ、たまにこのパイを食べるために
　ルクレア村を訪れる旅人もくるほどだ。
　もし食ったことがないなら、ぜひ食ってみるといい」

27.name: Adventurer
27.text:
"Speaking of Rukurea Village, there's also the
onion soup. It's delicious, made with plenty of
onions and venison. It's a dish that can instantly
blow away the fatigue of travel."
27.text2:
「これと、バターを一欠片入れた温かいワイン。
　生きてるって実感するよね」

28.name: Female Magician
28.text:
"The fried potatoes here are exquisite. The spices
make them go well with alcohol. Did you know?
Potatoes were brought here quite a long time ago
when trade began with the reptilian people in the
southern regions."
28.text2:
「こちらの地域の土ともよく合うらしくて、
　それ以来こちらでも多く育てられるようになったの。
　栄養もあるし、美味しいし、言うことないわよね」

29.name: Adventurer
29.text:
"In this land, a national alliance formed by small
countries takes the lead in governing the entire
area. There are many formidable threats that
cannot be dealt with by the power of each country
alone."
29.text2:
「その国家連合が出資してるのが、我らが冒険者ギルドだ。
　つまり、どの国にも肩入れしないある意味公平な組織と
　言えるかもしれない」

30.name: Old Sage
30.text:
"There are various types of chromatic dragons,
each with different personalities. The red dragon
is the most arrogant, greedy, and short-tempered.
The green dragon is cunning and treacherous. The
black dragon is cruel and wicked..."
30.text2:
「色彩竜に共通しているのは、奴らは邪悪であり
　混沌に属する者たちであるという事。
　破壊と支配と殺戮こそが奴らの歓びなのだ」

31.name: Adventurer
31.text:
"The blue dragon may be haughty and arrogant, but
there is some room for negotiation with them.
...That being said, it would take handing over all
the gold you have to be let off, paying an
exorbitant ransom to have prisoners released, and
the like."
31.text2:
「白竜は、常に腹を空かせた強大な猛獣よ。
　話も通じずただこちらを食う事しか頭にないものじゃ。
　雪山を冒険する時は奴の痕跡に注意されよ」

32.name: Old Sage
32.text:
"The black dragon... the Black Dragon is the most
terrifying. He is exceedingly cruel, taking the
most pleasure in tormenting the weak."
32.text2:
「かの屍したる黒竜王などが引き起こした惨劇は、
　いまだに詩となって語り継がれる程である」

33.name: Old Sage
33.text:
"Among the benevolent metallic dragons, the Silver
Dragon is particularly common in the human world.
It is said that they are especially attracted to
short-lived and passionate humans."
33.text2:
「あまりにも短く儚い生涯でありながら、他の種族を圧倒し
　思いもよらぬ偉業をいくつも果たす人間たちに
　強く惹かれて心を捕らわれるそうな。難儀な連中じゃのう」

34.name: Old Sage
34.text:
"The Gold Dragon... the Gold Dragon is the most
noble among dragons. Like a holy knight who stands
against evil and defeats wicked beings. If it
means fighting evil and saving the weak, they
would even sacrifice their lives."
34.text2:
「……儂の目の前におる金竜殿は……あまりそんな感じには
　見えないのう……。
　やはり竜と言えど個人差…個竜差が激しいのかのう……？」

35.name: Adventurer
35.text:
"The one leading the adventurers here is Eric.
That kid has a good sense of style, judgment, and
is popular. It's definitely charisma that brings
people together."
35.text2:
「ついでに言えば乳もでかい。尻もいい。太ももも太い。
　正直言うと色々したい　いや、されたい」

36.name: Adventurer
36.text:
"Isk, he always seems to appear out of nowhere and
then takes up a position in front of the bard. And
he mutters to himself with an unyielding
expression."
36.text2:
「聞いた話によると、イスクさんに竜の力を分けてもらった奴が
　いるらしい。嫉妬で気が狂いそうだ。脳が破壊される。」

37.name: Female Magician
37.text:
"A few years ago, a gold dragon descended upon
this village... Since then, Rukurea Village has
prospered tremendously. It seems to be thanks to
the protection of the gold dragon."
37.text2:
「きっと、ソルのお母様があなたと村のために
　死してなお力を貸してくれたのね。
　私達も感謝しなければね」

38.name: Female Magician
38.text:
"The owner of the tavern is quite a mysterious
person. There are various rumors about him, such
as being an adventurer in the past or actually
being a beastman, but the truth remains unknown."
38.text2:
「ただ、一度物凄い美人の女性と会ってたのを見たのよね……。
　でも色恋とか夫婦とかそういう感じではなさそうだったの。
　……どっちかと言うと、従者と主人とか……使い魔とか……」

39.name: Female Magician
39.text:
"The magician who lives in the tower, Master
Prestrois, is truly an amazing magician. It seems
that she was a disciple of Rowen, one of the five
top disciples of the legendary archmage."
39.text2:
「塔でポーションを煮てる姿からは想像もできないけどね。
　孫が出来てから思いっきり丸くなっちゃったらしいわよ」

40.name: Adventurer
40.text:
"It seems that the recent trend is carriages and
dragons. It even seems that there's a book about
it. It's said that a huge dragon thing pierces
carriages."
40.text2:
「正直僕にはわからない世界だ。
　わかりたくないのでそんな書物は読まない。
　でも……」
